name: Bollinger Band Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reversion strategy using Bollinger Bands for entry/exit signals.

entry_rules.long: Price touches or crosses below lower Bollinger Band
entry_rules.short: Price touches or crosses above upper Bollinger Band

exit_rules.long: Price reaches middle band (SMA) or upper band
exit_rules.short: Price reaches middle band (SMA) or lower band
